text: Paul Tessier (born 26 August 1961) is a Canadian rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Regina, Saskatchewan Category:Coxswains (rowing) Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games
title: Paul Tessier (rowing)
